title: deleted inbox messages when changing mail server help!
content:
Hi I recently changed mail server from my own server to 123reg server. As Ive moved mail servers before and edited the email settings on thunderbird rather than creating a new mailbox I thought it would be fine.

However when I changed the mail server settings on the account, password etc it has emptied the inbox, sent items everything all emails are gone and I'd really need to get those back as I hadn't backed them up foolishly

Is there any chance of getting a hold of the previously used folder and importing the emails or will those have been deleted from thunderbirds folders?

Many thanks ... Stuart
creator: info9911

title: U2F key login to Gmail doesn't work
content:
Good morning, I am using Thunderbird 115.2.2 (64 bit) Windows 11 and I cannot add new Gmail accounts that are secured by Google Advanced Protection (I have to use a U2F key to log in)/

When adding a new Google account in Thunderbird, after entering the password, information appears to use a U2F key and then the error "Chrome extension not found" appears and the install extension button which leads to a broken website https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ gnubbyd/beknehfpfkghjoafdifaflglpjkojoco which shows 404. An error occurred.

The requested URL could not be found on this server. That's all we know.


I tried uninstalling and reinstalling thunderbird, test-installing versions from the Microsoft store, and even formatting the computer and currently I am unable to add any Google account secured with a U2F yubikey key :( I use Google translator



Dzień dobry, używam Thunderbird 115.2.2 (64 bity) Windows 11 i nie mogę dodać nowych kont Gmail które są zabezpieczone przez Ochronę Zaawansowaną Google (muszę użyć klucza U2F do logowania)/

Podczas dodawania nowego konta Google w Thunderbird po wpisaniu hasła wyskakuje informacja żeby użyć klucza U2F a następnie pojawia się błąd "Nie znaleziono rozszerzenia Chrome" oraz przycisk zainstaluj rozszerzenie który prowadzi do niedziałającej strony https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/gnubbyd/beknehfpfkghjoafdifaflglpjkojoco na której wyświetla się 404. Wystąpił błąd.

Nie udało się znaleźć żądanego adresu URL na tym serwerze. To wszystko, co wiemy.


Próbowałem odinstalować i ponownie zainstalować thunderbird, instalowałem testowo wersje z microsoft store, a nawet formatowałem komputer i obecnie nie jestem w stanie dodać żadnego konta Google zabezpieczonego kluczem U2F yubikey :( Używam tłumacza google
creator: xj4c3kx

title: 'új lap' probléma
content:
Kedves Mindenki!

Úgy használom a Thunderbirdöt, hogy azokat a maileket, amelyekkel külön is kell foglalkoznom új lapon nyitom meg. Az új verzióban azonban rendszeresen előfordul, hogy néha csak úgy, néha újraindulásnál (pl. frissítés) "Probléma az oldal betöltésével" szöveg jelenik meg, így még arra sincs esélyem, hogy megtaláljam melyik üzenetről is van szó. Találkozott más is ezzel? Hogy lehetne orvosolni? Előre is nagyon köszönöm a segítséget.

Nekem még nem igazán sikerült megbarátkoznom az új verzióval... :-(

Tisztelettel: Honti György
creator: honti

title: Sending mail error, when I didn't send one
content:
Hi,

That's the third time in a few days I got this error : Sending failed; Une erreur est survenue lors de l’envoi de l’e-mail : erreur du serveur SMTP. Le serveur a répondu : mail.gandi.net Error: timeout exceeded., exitCode=2153066732, originalMsgURI=imap-message://myname%40mydomain.com@mail.gandi.net/INBOX#4356 (from log error, the erro windows only state the sending error and the timeout)

I didn't send any mail today, and the last one in my inbox is number 4354 so I don't understand why I got this message and what mail is it about.

Thanks for any information !
creator: s.mennetret

title: Non riesco ad aggiungere un account GMAIL a thunderbird
content: Quando lo faccio mi viene rifiutato per errore di login o password. Ma se vado sul web ed entro con quelle STESSE login e password sono accettato e visualizzo regolarmente le mie email. Avebo già l'account attivo e funzionanbte su Thunderbird ma da circa un mese fa se cercavo di visualizzare le email cliccando su "messaggi in arrivo" non accadeva più niente e vedevo solo il cursore rotante in attesa infinita di qualcosa. Ho quindi deciso di cancellare l'accounto e di riaggiungerlo, ma il risultato è stato quello che ho detto all'inizio. Spero che qualcuno sappia aiutarmi a risolvere.

content:
Hello, I just re installed Windows 10 and the current version of Thunderbird Mail 115.2.2 64 bit.

My issue is setting up my Proto Mail using the Proton Mail Bridge Program (Which worked for me before the re install). I am having an issue with the Certificate. I have reached out to Proton Mail also but have not had a response yet. I use all the server settings Proton asks us to use but Thunderbird does not see the Certificate as valid.

I can not send mail properly and after initial setup Thunderbird stops updating new mail from Proton

Any help would be appreciated

Regards, Ken
creator: kenriley1961

title: Thunderbird is only showing "some" events within my Google calendar
content:
I used to use the Gmail Provider addon for my Google Calendar, but it had been acting funny for months when it came to syncing. So I switched to native support and everything was working great mostly.

But then the last few days or so, the Calendar stopped showing some of the events. Some of them show just fine but a lot of my events are missing. They are still there on the Gmail side of things. They just don't show in Thunderbird.

I found a recent chat about this exact thing but it was an outdated issue that I believe was fixed. But here it is again (or maybe a different cause/bug is behind it this time).

I don't know if its the difference between events that show you as busy or free, or if something else is the variable the determines what shows and what isn't. But it is definitely not working right now. I had to sync my Google calendar with with Windows Calendar for the time being.
creator: jh20001

title: Limit subfolders shown - templates, sent
content:
I have 5 e-mail accounts, and move read e-mails to a related folder under Local Folders.

In TB 102, using the Unified view, there are grouped folders at the top for sent, templates, archive, draft, etc. Under each individual account, these were not duplicated. To get to Account A's Templates folder, I'd go to the unified Templates folder, expand it, and click on Account A Templates.

Now, under 115, these folders are shown _both_ under the Unified folder _and_ under each account. This not only takes up precious space, but is confusing. How can I get unified-eligible folders to show up _only_ under the Unified folder view?

Note that it seems to be only Sent and Template folders that are duplicated. I'm _not_ seeing duplicates of Archived, Junk, or Drafts.

I feel like I dealt with this in an earlier iteration of TB, but I'm damned if I can recall how, and can't find an answer through search.
creator: bma.query

title: Printing a single Email not the whole "chain" -  How can I do this?
content: Hi, I am using the latest Thunderbird 115.2.2 on a Win10 system and would like to print only the latest email from a long "chain" of emails. When I select the email I want to print it picks up all the "headers" from the old emails in the trail and wants to print all these as well. I have attached an example that only shows a small email, but I have some that have 15-20 emails in the trail. I know I can restrict how many pages to print but that seems like a cumbersome way to do it and still gives you "some partial info" from the other emails. I'm not sure what I'm missing and have been a long term Thunderbird user for many years. In the example attached, I only want to print the latest email at the top and not the following info that could in most cases be over about 7-8 pages. I hope my explanation is clear to you. Can you help, please? Many thanks, David
creator: dph2107
